subject: AI & Agents
title: Launch Checklist for Agent Apps
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Launch Checklist for Agent Apps.

hook.text: Shipping an agent without a checklist is how â€œsmall bugsâ€ become incidents.

buildup.text: Agents combine model risk + tool risk + data risk. You need a final gate.

discovery.text: Checklist: eval pass, budgets, logging, guardrails, privacy review, rollback.

twist.text: Rollbacks matter: the fastest fix is often â€œturn it offâ€ while you patch.

climax.text: Do a staged rollout with monitoring. Add a kill switch and an incident runbook.

punchline.text: A checklist is your last guardrail.

quiz.question: What belongs on a launch checklist?
